short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyzes and displays the technology stack of the current website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tech Stack Analyzer - Uncover the Technologies Behind Any Website

Discover the building blocks of the web with Tech Stack Analyzer, your go-to Chrome extension for instant insights into the technologies powering any website you visit.

Key Features:

1. Comprehensive Technology Detection:
   - Frontend Technologies: Identify HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and popular frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.js.
   - Backend Technologies: Detect server-side languages and frameworks such as PHP, ASP.NET, Node.js, and more.
   - Content Management Systems (CMS): Recognize popular CMS platforms including WordPress, Drupal, and Joomla.
   - Server Information: Identify the web server software and hosting provider when possible.
   - Programming Languages: Get insights into the primary programming languages used in both frontend and backend development.
   - Frameworks and Libraries: Discover the key frameworks and libraries utilized in the website's architecture.
   - Infrastructure and DevOps: Gain visibility into the hosting and deployment technologies when detectable.

2. User-Friendly Interface:
   - Clean, modern design with color-coded categories for easy reading.
   - Instant results with a single click on the extension icon.
   - Detailed breakdown of detected technologies in an easy-to-understand format.

3. Privacy-Focused:
   - All analysis is performed locally in your browser.
   - No data is collected, stored, or transmitted to external servers.
   - Respects your privacy and the privacy of the websites you analyze.

4. Lightweight and Fast:
   - Minimal impact on browser performance.
   - Quick analysis without slowing down your browsing experience.

5. Educational Tool:
   - Perfect for developers, students, and tech enthusiasts to learn about web technologies in use.
   - Gain insights into industry trends and popular technology stacks.

6. Professional Utility:
   - Invaluable for web developers, designers, and IT professionals for competitive analysis and inspiration.
   - Useful for recruiters and hiring managers to verify candidates' technology claims.

How to Use:
Simply navigate to any website and click on the Tech Stack Analyzer icon in your Chrome toolbar. Within seconds, you'll see a comprehensive breakdown of the technologies detected on the current page.

Whether you're a curious web surfer, a student learning web development, or a seasoned professional conducting research, Tech Stack Analyzer provides valuable insights into the technologies that power the modern web.

Expand your knowledge of web technologies, one click at a time, with Tech Stack Analyzer!

Note: While our extension strives for accuracy, some technologies may not be detectable due to server-side configurations or security measures implemented by websites.
